sys_script_include.name: DominoUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_927eff0a07d75810c11df2218c1ed06f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_513186_domino_ap.DominoUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>DominoUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var DominoUtils = Class.create();
DominoUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	retrieveFwRequest: function() {
		var results = [];
		var rules = {};
		var srcReq = new GlideRecord('x_513186_domino_ap_firewall');
		srcReq.get(this.getParameter('sys_id'));
		if(!srcReq) {
			gs.error("Could not locate application with ID " + this.getParameter('sys_id') + " in " + this.getParameter('table'));
			return;
		}
		
		rules = new DominoUtils().copyRules(srcReq.sys_id);
		results = [{
			"u_service_wbc_code": srcReq.u_service_wbc_code + "",
			"u_service_name": srcReq.u_service_name + "",
			"u_service_manager": srcReq.u_service_manager + "",
			"u_requested_for": srcReq.u_requested_for + "",
			"u_project_name": srcReq.u_project_name + "",
			"u_options": srcReq.u_options + "",
			"u_deputies": srcReq.u_deputies + "",
			"u_comment": srcReq.u_comment + "",
			"server_groups": srcReq.server_groups + "",
			"requested_expiration_date": srcReq.requested_expiration_date + "",
			"network_groups": srcReq.network_groups + "",
			"estimated_start_date": srcReq.estimated_start_date + "",
			"description": srcReq.description + "",
			"rules": JSON.stringify(rules)
		}];
		return JSON.stringify(results[0]);
		
	},
	
	copyRules: function(srcSysId) {
		var ruleDetails = {};
		var rules = [];
		var src = new GlideRecord('x_513186_domino_ap_firewall_rules');
		src.addQuery("firewall_req_id", srcSysId);
		src.addQuery("domino_status", "!=", "deleted");
		src.query();
		while(src.next()) {
			gs.info("inside the while loop");
			ruleDetails = {"dest_ip_address": src.dest_ip_address+ "",
							"dest_ip_mask": src.dest_mask+ "",
							"dest_server_name": src.dest_server_name+ "",
							"nese_service_name": src.nese_service_name+ "",
							"port_number": src.port_number+ "",
							"protocol": src.protocol+ "",
							"source_ip_address": src.source_ip_address+ "",
							"source_ip_mask": src.source_mask+ "",
							"source_server_name": src.source_server_name+ "",
							"source_server_network_group": src.source_server_network_group + "",
							"dest_server_network_group": src.dest_server_network_group + "",
							"dest_ports_group": src.dest_ports_group + "",
							"sys_id": src.sys_id + ""
						};
			rules.push(ruleDetails);
		}
		return rules;
	},
	
    type: 'DominoUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>cuong</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-18 20:13:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>927eff0a07d75810c11df2218c1ed06f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DominoUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Domino App" source="x_513186_domino_ap">21e2d540070b5010c11df2218c1ed04b</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Domino App">21e2d540070b5010c11df2218c1ed04b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_927eff0a07d75810c11df2218c1ed06f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>cuong</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-21 10:27:39</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
